name: ucFirst
description: Transforms the first letter of a string to uppercase

examples.title: Basic usage
examples.description: Lucee4.5+ Capitalizes the first character of the first word only.

examples.title: Capitalize all the words in string
examples.description: Lucee4.5+ Using the optional doAll parameter capitalizes the first character of all words. Word separators are: whitespace, period, parenthesis, or dash.
examples.code: ucFirst("cfdocs.org is your (everyone's) resource for cf-related documentation!", true)
examples.result: Cfdocs.Org Is Your (Everyone's) Resource For Cf-Related Documentation!

examples.title: Handling of strings in all uppercase
examples.description: Lucee4.5+ Using the optional doLowerIfAllUppercase parameter allows for intelligent capitalization of words in all caps.
examples.code: ucFirst("CFDOCS.ORG YOUR (EVERYONE'S) RESOURCE FOR CF-RELATED DOCUMENTATION!", true, true)
examples.result: Cfdocs.Org Your (Everyone's) Resource For Cf-Related Documentation!
